T16D4407:344b-0: @344b `[?] /'phags pa stong chen po rab tu 'joms
T16D4407:344b-1: pa las gsungs pa'i bde legs su 'gyur ba'i tshigs
T16D4407:344b-4: # // dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
T16D4407:344b-6: mtho ris dag na rin chen mchog yod pa //
T16D4407:344b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa lha yi lhar gyur pa //
T16D4407:344b-8: mi mchog de dang 'dir ni mtshungs pa med //
T16D4407:344b-9: de bas 'dir ni rin chen mchog tu gsungs //
T16D4407:344b-10: bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog / zad pa chags bral bdud rtsi 'dus ma byas //
T16D4407:344b-11: shes pas sh'akya thub des rab tu phye //
T16D4407:344b-12: bdud rtsi zhi ba 'dus ma byas yin pa //
T16D4407:344b-13: chos de dang ni mtshungs pa gang yang med //
T16D4407:344b-14: de bas 'dir ni rin chen mchog tu gsungs //
T16D4407:344b-15: bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog / mchog tu gang 'dod tshul bzhin rab tu bstan //
T16D4407:344b-16: ston pa'i bla med rnal 'byor rtag sgrub pa //
T16D4407:344b-17: rdo rje lta bu'i mig gnyis lam mthong ba //
T16D4407:344b-18: ting 'dzin de dang mnyam pa yod ma yin //
T16D4407:344b-19: de bas 'dir ni rin chen mchog tu gsungs //
T16D4407:344b-20: bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog / gang zag chen po brgyad pos rab bsngags shing //
T16D4407:344b-21: gang zag zung bzhir brjod pa de dag ni //
T16D4407:344b-22: drang srong chen po gang zag mtshungs med pa //
T16D4407:344b-23: bde bar gshegs pas sbyin pa'i gnas zhes gsungs //
T16D4407:344b-24: de la byin na 'bras bu cher 'gyur te //
T16D4407:344b-25: zhing rab gshin la sa bon btab pa bzhin //
T16D4407:344b-26: 'di ni dge 'dun rin chen mchog tu gsungs //
T16D4407:344b-27: bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog / gang dag brtan pa'i yid kyis rab brtson zhing //
T16D4407:344b-28: goo ta ma'i bstan la 'jug byed pa //
T16D4407:344b-29: de dag thos nas bdud rtsi mchog thob ste //
T16D4407:344b-30: mun pa bsal nas mya ngan 'das thob pa //
T16D4407:344b-31: de bas dge 'dun rin chen mchog tu gsungs //
T16D4407:344b-32: bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog / mthong ba 'di la sbyar ma thag tu ni //
T16D4407:345a-1: lta dang tshul khrims brtul zhugs dang //
T16D4407:345a-2: the tshom dang ni nyon mongs gsum po dag / cig car spangs te 'phags pa'i bden pa mthong //
T16D4407:345a-3: des na dge 'dun rin chen mchog tu gsungs //
T16D4407:345a-4: bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog / lus sam ngag gam 'on te yid kyis kyang//
T16D4407:345a-5: sdig pa rnam gsum nam yang mi byed la //
T16D4407:345a-6: glo bur byas na'ang 'chab par mi byed cing //
T16D4407:345a-7: de ltar de la lta bas 'dzin mi byed //
T16D4407:345a-8: des na dge 'dun rin chen mchog tu gsungs //
T16D4407:345a-9: bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog / ji ltar dbang po'i sdong po sar btsugs pa //
T16D4407:345a-10: phyogs bcu'i rlung rnams kyis ni mi g-yo ltar //
T16D4407:345a-11: 'phags pa'i lam gyis dam pa mthong ba yi //
T16D4407:345a-12: gang zag 'phags pa'i dge 'dun de bzhin no //
T16D4407:345a-13: des na dge 'dun rin chen mchog tu gsungs //
T16D4407:345a-14: bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog / shes rab zab mos shin tu bstan pa yis //
T16D4407:345a-15: 'phags pa'i bden pa su dag rnam bsgom zhing //
T16D4407:345a-16: lus kyang sbyin pa sbyin pa yid la byas pas ni //
T16D4407:345a-17: de dag 'jigs pa brgyad dang phrad mi 'gyur //
T16D4407:345a-18: des na dge 'dun rin chen mchog tu gsungs //
T16D4407:345a-19: bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog / ji ltar me ni rlung gis rab gtor la //
T16D4407:345a-20: lag tu blangs te bgrang du med pa nyid //
T16D4407:345a-21: de ltar kun du sbyor ba rab btang ba'i //
T16D4407:345a-22: sangs rgyas sras rnams bstan du med par 'gro //
T16D4407:345a-23: des na dge 'dun rin chen mchog tu gsungs //
T16D4407:345a-24: bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog / sems can gang dag 'gro dang mi 'gro ba //
T16D4407:345a-25: de dag thams cad 'dir ni dge bar shog / ston mchog dam pa lha mis mchod 'os pa //
T16D4407:345a-26: sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal ding 'dir bde legs shog / sems can gang dag 'gro dang mi 'gro ba //
T16D4407:345a-27: de dag thams cad 'dir ni bde legs shog / zhi ba chags bral lha mis mchod 'os pa //
T16D4407:345a-28: chos la phyag 'tshal ding 'dir bde legs shog / sems can gang dag 'gro dang mi 'gro ba //
T16D4407:345a-29: de dag thams cad 'dir ni bder gyur cig / tshogs kyi dam pa lha mis mchod 'os pa //
T16D4407:345a-30: dge 'dun phyag 'tshal ding 'dir bde legs shog /'byung po gang dag 'dir ni lhags gyur te //
T16D4407:345b-0: sa'am 'on te bar snang 'khod pa dag / skye dgu rnams la rtag tu byams byed @345b cing ;
T16D4407:345b-1: / nyin dang mtshan du chos la spyod par shog /'di ni rgyal ba dgra rgyal bden gang gis //
T16D4407:345b-2: shin tu bden pa gsungs shing brdzun med pa //
T16D4407:345b-3: bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog /
T16D4407:345b-4: de kun 'jigs pa che las thar gyur cig /
T16D4407:345b-5: rdzogs sangs rnam par sangs rgyas che //
T16D4407:345b-6: 'jig rten skyong bas phyogs bzhi nas //
T16D4407:345b-7: snod bzhi dag ni blangs nas su //
T16D4407:345b-8: bde bar gshegs la phul ba dang //
T16D4407:345b-9: mthu yis gcig tu sprul mdzad pa //
T16D4407:345b-10: lha yi snod mchog de dag ni //
T16D4407:345b-11: bdud rtsi 'dra ba'i sman gyi rnams //
T16D4407:345b-12: ston pa'i phyag na bsnams gyur pa //
T16D4407:345b-13: bden pa'i tshig ni de dag gis //
T16D4407:345b-14: sman rnams bdud rtsir 'gyur bar shog / de bzhin lha mo 'phrog ma yis //
T16D4407:345b-15: lha rdzas dge ba aa ru ra //
T16D4407:345b-16: blangs nas ston la rab phul ba //
T16D4407:345b-17: bdud rtsi 'dra ba'i sman gyi rnams //
T16D4407:345b-18: bden pa'i tshig ni de dag gis //
T16D4407:345b-19: nad pa rnams kyis nad sel cing //
T16D4407:345b-20: nyes pa thams cad 'phrog byed pa //
T16D4407:345b-21: sman rnams bdud rtsir 'gyur bar shog / sangs rgyas rnam gzigs gzi brjid dang //
T16D4407:345b-22: gtsug phud can gyi stobs rnams dang //
T16D4407:345b-23: thams cad skyob kyi bden tshig dang //
T16D4407:345b-24: log dad sel gyi ting 'dzin dang //
T16D4407:345b-25: gser zhes bya ba'i ye shes dang //
T16D4407:345b-27: sh'akya seng ge'i mthu rnams kyis //
